LanguageData.Settlers_Wanted.questDescriptionAndNameR: questDescription->[asker_nameFull], [asker_faction_leaderTitle] of [asker_faction_name] hails us. Apparently, the notorious [criminal_nameFull] of [siteFaction_name] is hiding out in our vicinity. \n[asker_nameDef] is asking us to bring [nickname] to one of their settlements for a grand sum of [bounty] silver, double if alive. They are hiding in a safe house and it's probably guarded. \nIf we clear out their camp, [allRewardsDescriptions]
LanguageData.Settlers_Wanted.root.nodes.11.node.nodes: [criminal_nameFull] heard about their compromised position thus have decided to leave the area. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.
LanguageData.Settlers_Wanted.root.nodes.12.node.nodes: The brigands has packed up and moved on.
LanguageData.Settlers_Wanted.root.nodes.13.node.custo: You have defeated [criminal_nameFull] and eliminated the camp!\n\nThe bonus reward from [asker_faction_name] has arrived.
LanguageData.VFES_CaravanRaid.questDescriptionRules.r: questDescription->[asker_nameFull], [asker_faction_leaderTitle] of [asker_faction_name], has sent us a message. Apparently, [siteFaction_pawnsPlural] are resting with their beasts before continuing their journey. \n[asker_nameDef] gave us their location, if we want to, we can go attack them.
LanguageData.VFES_CaravanRaid.root.nodes.10.node.node: The [siteFaction_pawnsPlural] packed up their stuff and moved on. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.
LanguageData.VFES_CaravanRaid.root.nodes.11.node.node: After being discovered, the [siteFaction_pawnsPlural] left. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has ended.
